title: Good matchups vs Talon?
body: God I hate laning against dis fgt

replies.body:
{{champion:64}} ?
Also, go here for counter picking strategies. 
http://www.championselect.net/champions

I've never been able to play Vlad all that well, never understood his champion design. And I feel like Lissandra is in a really bad state right now. She just doesn't output enough damage to deal with all these big tanks runnin' around.
Yeah I feel like she's still viable there provides good cc and initiation for team and has a very impactful tp presence.
play ekko and youll never have to worry about vsing someone that will kill you. unless you dont know how to faceroll
Just play something tanky and buy some armour items.

Melees that can kill him in an all in. e.g. Fizz, Riven

Ranged champions with decent harass and a non ult cc ability to use if he jumps on you, e.g. Brand, Lissandra

Champions like the above will make it very hard for talon to farm if played right and he will have no kill potential except ganks. More important is HOW you're playing the lane though. Talons laning phase is very weak if you know how to exploit it.
